attributes.action: Reinstate the 10% tax band for all those on a low income.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If Gordon Brown is serious about reducing poverty and improving the lives of the poor, why then did he abolish the 10% tax for those on low incomes, and at the same time, reduce the amount of tax from 22% to 20% for those on a higher income? The rich get richer, yet again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
